headline: PL Developments Builds a Smarter, Healthier Supply Chain with Kinaxis
summary: OTTAWA, Ontario, August 12, 2025--Kinaxis® (TSX:KXS), a global leader in end-to-end supply chain orchestration, today announced that PL Developments (PLD), a leading manufacturer and distributer of over-the-counter pharmaceuticals and healthcare products, has selected the Kinaxis Maestro™ platform to meet growing demand from consumers and major U.S. retailer partners. By replacing manual tools and spreadsheets with AI-powered orchestration and predictive planning, PLD will accelerate the deliver
